67 class IfPersCourse:
68

70  def fetch(id, db): pass

73 class UiCourse(IfUiCourse):
74 
75  def run(self, request, courseid):
76 
77  user = request.session['user']
78 
79  if request.method == "GET":
80  if courseid in user['courses']:
81  course = self.bus.getCourse(user, courseid)
82  return render(request, "Course/frame.html", {'course':course})
83  else:
84  raise PermissionDenied(lang.DICT["EXCEPTION_403_STD"])
85

88 
89  def getCourse(self, user, courseid):
90  return True

93 
94  def fetch(id, db):
95  return False
